name: Forest Of The Shadows
description:
Forest Of The Shadows First game that I made independently Story

You are lost in a dark forest only with a flashlight that flickers more frequently than the light in my basement and it's all you have to guide you through a dark forest. There are glowing mushrooms to find in this forest, but you must also be cautious of the shadows that appear in the woods. Once you have obtained a certain quantity of mushrooms, you should enter the portal.

feel free to judge me, suggest me something or help with bugs in the comments.
